title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement [INSERT CONTACT METHOD]. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.0, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/ code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https:// www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

title: Contributing to vsezved
text: can fix typos, spelling mistakes, grammatical errors documentation directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. generally means ’ll need edit roxygen2 comments .R, .Rd file. can find .R file generates .Rd reading comment first line.

title: Contributing to vsezved
text: want make bigger change, ’s good idea first file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s needed. ’ve found bug, please file issue illustrates bug minimal reprex (also help write unit test, needed).

title: Contributing to vsezved
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven’t done , recommend using usethis::create_from_github("", fork = TRUE). Install development dependences devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn’t pass cleanly, ’s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md (.e. just first header). Follow style described https://style.tidyverse.org/news.html.

title: Contributing to vsezved
text: New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat unit tests. Contributions test cases included easier accept.

title: Contributing to vsezved
text: Please note vsezved project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project agree abide terms.

Get school directory — vz_get_directory
text: function performs search school directory uiv.cz returns resulting export -  either XLS file data, . school directory version school register: unlike core register, contains contact information lacks information (unique address identification.) Use vz_get_register() core register.

title: Get school directory — vz_get_directory
code: vz_get_directory(   tables = c("addresses", "schools", "locations", "specialisations"),   ...,   return_tibbles = FALSE,   write_files = TRUE,   dest_dir = getwd() )

title: Get school directory — vz_get_directory
text: tables character vector tables retrieve. See ** Tables** . ... key-value pairs search fields. Use vz_get_search_fields() see list fields potential values. return_tibbles Whether return data (TRUE) download files (FALSE). write_files Whether write XLS files locally. dest_dir Directory write XLS files. Defaults working directory.

title: Get school directory — vz_get_directory
text: list tibbles return_tibbles = TRUE, single tibble one table name passed tables, otherwise character vector paths downloaded *.xls files. return_tibbles TRUE, named list tibbles, tibble table tables corresponding name, unless function called tables parameter length one, case result tibble; return_tibbles FALSE, result character vector file paths. Note downloaded XLS files fact HTML files best loading using vz_load_directory() tidying vz_load_directory, though can opened Excel .

title: Get school directory — vz_get_directory
text: Tables can include "addresses", "schools", "locations", "specialisations". need tables based query (fields), pass single function call order avoid burdening data provider's server (server needs perform search function call; caching data dumps made available).

title: Get school directory — vz_get_directory
text: function performs search school directory uiv.cz default search schools, unless ... params set narrow search traverses results export links downloads XLS files loads tibbles return_tibbles TRUE way get data - static dumps available. time, intense web scraping takes place - individual export files (max 4 per call) downloaded way done manually.

title: Get school directory — vz_get_directory
text: avoid blitzing data provider's server many heavy requests: need tables based search, pass one call, using tables argument. means one initial search peformed. ask tables need. need subset data, use fields (...) argument need multiple subsets data, try via fields (...) argument , though may always possible. downloading large dump reusing pipeline, keep downloaded XLS files (export) locally (setting write_files TRUE), use caching avoid calling function repeatedly (ideally make reruns conditional age stored export use pipeline management framework targets.

what: Download and read school register — vz_get_register
title: Download and read school register — vz_get_register
text: high-level function getting data online XML export school register. downloads file (whole country default) turns tibble, cleaning names dropping uninteresting columns (may change package matures.)

title: Download and read school register — vz_get_register
code: vz_get_register(   nuts3_kod = NULL,   url = NULL,   tables = c("organisations", "schools", "locations", "specialisations"),   write_file = TRUE,   dest_dir = getwd() )

title: Download and read school register — vz_get_register
text: nuts3_kod used point per-region datasets; left unset, defaults state-wide data url URL; left NULL, use internal default tables tables return. Can one "organisations", "schools", "locations" "specialisations" (specialisations yet available via package). write_file Whether keep downloaded XML file. Currently writing working directory supported. dest_dir write resulting XML

title: Download and read school register — vz_get_register
text: tibble list tibbles multiple table names passed tables.

title: vsezved (development version)
text: vz_*_register() works ; longer relies MŠMT’s now defunct CKAN catalogue API. quick fix - proper way work DCAT SPARQL endpoint data.gov.cz. new functions *_stistko_*() getting codelists (“číselník”) stistko server fixed vz_get_directory() accommodate changes server
